Package org.fosstrak.epcis.repository.query

Interface Summary
QueryOperationsBackend The QueryOperationsBackend provides the persistence functionality required by the QueryOperationsModule.
 

Class Summary
MasterDataQueryDTO TODO: javadoc
QueryInitServlet This HttpServlet is used to initialize the QueryOperationsModule.
QueryOperationsBackendSQL The QueryOperationsBackendSQL uses basic SQL statements (actually PreparedStatements) to implement the QueryOperationsBackend interface.
QueryOperationsModule EPCIS Query Operations Module implementing the SOAP/HTTP binding of the Query Control Interface.
QueryOperationsSession TODO: Javadoc
QueryOperationsWebService This class redirects the calls received from the Web service stack to the underlying QueryOperationsModule and ensures that any uncaught exception is properly catched and wrapped into an ImplementationExceptionResponse.
QuerySubscription Implements a subscription to a query.
QuerySubscriptionScheduled Special case of Subscription (from subscribe() on query interface) where the subscription is scheduled.
QuerySubscriptionTriggered Implementation of triggers.
Schedule This is a simple schedule which can return a "next scheduled time" after now or a given time.
SimpleEventQueryDTO TODO: javadoc
SimpleEventQueryDTO.EventQueryParam  
 

Enum Summary
SimpleEventQueryDTO.Operation  
SimpleEventQueryDTO.OrderDirection
